title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 562.7 - Towing and immobilizing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 562.7 - Towing and immobilizing

State Regulations

The university police department may authorize the towing
away or immobilizing of vehicles parked in violation of the rules and
regulations of the college. Any expense involved in removal or immobilization
of vehicles, such as towing and storage charges, will be the responsibility of
the owner of the vehicle. Fines for intra-campus tow violations will be in
addition to fines for violations issued for no parking 1am-6am when the vehicle
must be moved for the purpose of snow removal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
562.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
